text:
Здравейте, 

Успешно активирахте софтуерен токън m-Token Postbank. 
С m-Token Postbank можете да потвърждавате Вашите трансакции, направени през интернет и мобилно банкиране, както и картови плащания в сайтове на търговци, обозначени с Mastercard Identity Check и Visa Secure. 

За повече информация посетете www.postbank.bg или се свържете с нас на *7224. 

С уважение,
Екипът на Пощенска банка





Dear Customer, 

You have successfully activated а software token m-Token Postbank. 
With m-Token Postbank you can authorize your internet & mobile banking transactions and your online card payments to merchants which support Mastercard Identity Check and Visa Secure. 

For more information visit www.postbank.bg or contact us at *7224. 

Kind regards, 
Postbank Team

If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any disclosure, copying, distribution or taking any action in reliance on the contents of this information is strictly prohibited and may be unlawful. If you have received this communication by mistake, please notify us immediately by responding to this email and then delete it from your system. If you suspect that the message may have been intercepted or amended, please call the sender. **********************************************************************
subject: Успешно активиране на m-Token Postbank / Successful activation of m-Token Postbank
